column4: I just pointed out to the crappy sysadmin, "but, didn't you say you ordered machines with 4GB RAM? why does sys info say 3?" *watch panic rising*
he should be sacked on the spot
yep.. this is policy in one of the Fortune500.. size may matter, but it sure doesn't say anything about sanity.. :)
oh no.. he's awarded "boss of the year" every second year..
